user.description: Please enter the IP Address of your Android/Google TV.

remote_url_not_allowed.message: Cannot send TvOverlay notification with image url "{url}" which is not secure to load data from. Only url's added to `{allow_url_list}` are accessible. See {help_url} for more information.

remote_file_not_allowed.message: Cannot send TvOverlay notification with image file "{file_name}" from directory "{file_path}" which is not secure to load data from. Only folders added to `{allow_file_list}` are accessible. See {help_url} for more information.

invalid_positon_value.message: Invalid position value "{position}", Has to be one of {positions_values}.

invalid_shape_value.message: Invalid shape value "{shape}", Has to be one of {shape_values}.

invalid_image.message: Invalid notification image. No valid URL, local_path or mdi_icon found in image attributes.
